channel.title: CVE Feed for MIT -- krb5
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MIT -- krb5

item.title: CVE-2019-14844|2024-08-05T00:26:39.128Z -- mit -- krb5
item.description: A flaw was found in, Fedora versions of krb5 from 1.16.1 to, including 1.17.x, in the way a Kerberos client could crash the KDC by sending one of the RFC 4556 "enctypes". A remote unauthenticated user could use this flaw to crash the KDC.
